resources.string:
1. Make sure that necessary services are turned on (Bluetooth / GPS for pairing).

 2. Pair with the device you want to play against. If you are already paired, you can skip this step.

 3. Start the game on either device. Connect to the game from the other device.

 4. Move the paddles by dragging or tapping. Try to beat your opponent!
First scan for nearby devices, then tap the device you want to pair with.
